title: Linear velocity_decay not included in Link::GetWorldLinearAccel

content.raw: To model a quadrotor I used a linear velocity_decay on its main link as a simple drag model. However, when measuring the link's linear acceleration using GetWorldLinearAccel(), this velocity decay is not taken into account: the function returns a positive acceleration even when the model has reached its steady-state velocity. Is this the intended behavior (since the velocity_decay is not a force) or a bug?
